Description.Text: The Holistic Six Senses Spa provides a truly relaxing and revitalizing experience, offering therapeutic menus to rejuvenate and revitalize the senses. Skilled therapists create sensory journeys for guests, with a range of holistic wellness and pampering treatments. The spa focuses into the lush tropical forested hillside and is styled after an Asian long-house. In addition, there are several separate treatment salas and a gym. (05/09CJ)

The resort is located on the Island of Yao Noi, situated midway between Phuket and Krabi, among the awe-inspiring limestone pinnacles of Phang Nga. Traveling time from the airport from Phuket is around forty five minutes to one hour by motor boat.

Hideaway Pool villa (154 sq.m.) offers very generous personal space plus a private infinity-edged pool with a double spa sala on the pool deck for private treatments. The terrace area has sun loungers and an outside dining area.There is a separate bedroom and a sitting room, plus a bathroom that features an outside shower.

Accommodations provide generous personal space and present an uncompromised standard of luxury. The Resort offer elegantly designed modern architecture positioned with an image supporting the Six Senses Hideaway theme , Redefining Experiences. All villas have open-style bathrooms, creating an atmosphere of space and light within and boast magnificent views of the bay and surrounding forestation. Each villa also features its own infinity-edged pool with sundeck, creating an illusion of infinity between pool and bay, and reinforcing a feeling of seclusion. Local building techniques have been adopted, using natural materials that are in harmony with environment. External and interior walls are wood paneled, with roofs constructed of sago palm leaf thatching. Each villa is attended by a butler who is trained to anticipate every whim.

A central split-level structure features a Chef's Table on the top level, plus a cooking station with one long table surrounding it. The main dining area is on the lower level, with several private dining pavilions located in the wild mangroves and plantation palms. A tranquil water feature meanders through this area , over a glass bottom floor , while organic vegetable and herb gardens are close at hand for the freshest salads and to complement the exquisite Italian Cuisine in the Dining Room In-Villa Dining Private in-villa or terrace dining compliments the secluded peaceful atmosphere. For the true romantic, the villa butler will arrange for a champagne breakfast, a private picnic or an evening barbecue beneath the stars, with a personal chef and waiter at the ready.
The lobby is not big enough for a group of approx. 25 pax (with their luggage) to check in (standing in the lobby).

Message.Text:
Essential Information:
Complimentary WiFi internet access provided Applicable from 17/Apr/2018 to 31/Oct/2019
Complimentary welcome drink upon check in Applicable from 17/Apr/2018 to 31/Oct/2019
Complimentary welcome fruit provided Applicable from 17/Apr/2018 to 31/Oct/2019
Complimentary use of gym Applicable from 17/Apr/2018 to 31/Oct/2019
Early departure fee may apply Applicable from 19/Apr/2018 to 31/Dec/9999
Please note: Resort requires flight details and number of passengers a minimum of 48 hours in advance. Flight information should be sent to reservations-yaonoi@sixsenses.com. SCHEDULED BOAT: From Phuket Airport to Koh Yao Noi by shared minivan with shared scheduled boat at THB 1,500 net per person one way or private minivan/luxury sedan with shared scheduled boat at THB 2,250 net per person one way. Phuket Island/other resorts to Yao Noi by private minivan/luxury sedan with shared scheduled boat at THB 2,250 net per person one way. **Rates are per person for scheduled service minimum 2 pax. // NON SCHEDULED BOAT/PRIVATE from Phuket Airport and Phuket Island (other resorts) to Koh Yao Noi by private minivan/luxury sedan with Private boat at THB 11,500 net * one way per villa **Max 5 pax, over 5 pax supplement of THB 2,500 net for each additional vehicle for land transfer only. Scheduled transfers are per person one way based on a minimum of 2 persons and include both land and boat transfers. Children 0-5yrs FOC and 6-11yrs 50% off. 12yrs and over are charged at full rate. Non Scheduled/Private transfers are per villa flat rate and include both land and boat transfers to a maximum of 5 persons. For more than 5 persons a supplement of THB 2,500 net one way applies for each additional vehicle required for the land transfer. Transfers to and from other areas including Krabi are available. Rates are on request from reservations. Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
